Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <Hermes08> Each time you make a transaction a utxo is spent and a reward is generated. The GUI version of the wallet only automates with a button a transaction of sending the balance to your same public address. Even if you send a transaction to another address you will see a reward depending on the uTxos you have in that address . You could verify by checking it on the explorer as well as in your own wallet.  Here is a reward viewer for you to see how many rewards you have acummulated  https://dexstats.info/rewards.php (re @douglaspelo: Through the CLI? Does it just work after you do that and how can you confirm it worked?)
